1.title: Re-Group
1.plot: Brenan, fresh from yet another rejection, decides to look up and old friend, only to find that not only have they been meeting up without him, he's been replaced.

2.title: Ok Ok Ok
2.plot: Killian's Web series inexplicably starts going viral while Roly and Sarah attempt to clean up the mess they've made.

3.title: What's up Dark
3.plot: Jayne inability to locate the source of a noise leads the gang on a journey around her flat looking for the culprit, while Sarah is unable to fulfil the order she promised to the hipsters.

4.title: Post Drinks
4.plot: After a night out in the pub Jayne returns with a guy and the unwelcome gang in tow. She now has to get them all out before she loses her man.

6.title: Finale
6.plot: Killian celebrates hitting a million subscribers, but is interrupted by his new nemesis. Jayne tries to hide from her new present, Brenan is welcomed into a members club but no one wants Sarah in their story.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: When Brenan's life inevitably falls apart, he decides to reply to Roly's numerous begging messages for a catch up. Arriving for a Pre Drink with Roly and Dealer before going out, Brenan takes up the mantel of getting a girl, next door neighbour Jayne, to join them for a drink.

2.title: Squatter's Delight
2.plot: After several weeks staying in every Friday night, Brenan finally convinces the gang to go out, however it would seem that a higher power is against him.

3.title: Censorious Witness
3.plot: Jayne decides to introduce her brother, Colm, to the gang however things don't quite go to plan.

4.title: Bombs Away
4.plot: Jayne and Roly are alone together for the first time before Brenan finally gets the offer he has been waiting for.

5.title: Pillow Talk
5.plot: On a Tuesday night Roly is sitting down to play poker before interruptions occur which ruin his night

6.title: #Shercock
6.plot: Its Roly's birthday and Killian has a special surprise for him which has severe ramifications for the group.

imdb.plot outline: When Brenan's (Keir Carroll) life inevitably falls apart, he decides to finally reply to his friend from school, Roly's (Anthony Joblin) numerous begging messages for a catch up. Arriving for a Pre Drink with Roly and Roly's Dealer (Liam Evans) before going out, Brenan takes up the mantel of getting a girl, next door neighbour Jayne (Dorothy Fitzgerald), to join them for a drink. Created by Matt Rawlings and written by Matthew J Smith and Alex Jones, Pre Drinks is a sitcom about four friends who struggle to leave the house every Friday night as often things such as Dinosaurs, Cakes, Poker, Religion, Pillows, Rapping, Shots, Sherlock, Birthdays and Samsung text tones, to name a few, get in the way.
imdb.title: Pre Drinks
plot: When Brenan's (Keir Carroll) life inevitably falls apart, he decides to finally reply to his friend from school, Roly's (Anthony Joblin) numerous begging messages for a catch up. Arriving for a Pre Drink with Roly and Roly's Dealer (Liam Evans) before going out, Brenan takes up the mantel of getting a girl, next door neighbour Jayne (Dorothy Fitzgerald), to join them for a drink. Created by Matt Rawlings and written by Matthew J Smith and Alex Jones, _Pre Drinks_ (qv) is a sitcom about four friends who struggle to leave the house every Friday night as often things such as Dinosaurs, Cakes, Poker, Religion, Pillows, Rapping, Shots, Sherlock, Birthdays and Samsung text tones, to name a few, get in the way.
